about_the_game:
Indulge in Fall of Porcupines' cozy soundtrack with 45 lovingly crafted tracks and the digital artbook, packed with over 100 pages of concept art, drawings, and sketches, offering a delightful dose of wholesomeness. Sit back, relax, and enjoy!



  • 35 Tracks, plus 10 tracks exclusive to the "Save the World"-Edition.
  • An awesome artbook with over 100 pages of wholesomeness.
  • 30% of proceeds of every sold DLC are donated to a nonprofit organization supporting healthcare around the world.

The Artbook file can be found on your local device after downloading this DLC. Please select "Browse Files" from your Steam-Library

Indulge in Fall of Porcupines' cozy soundtrack with 45 lovingly crafted tracks and the digital artbook, packed with over 100 pages of concept art, drawings, and sketches, offering a delightful dose of wholesomeness. Sit back, relax, and enjoy!



  • 35 Tracks, plus 10 tracks exclusive to the "Save the World"-Edition.
  • An awesome artbook with over 100 pages of wholesomeness.
  • 30% of proceeds of every sold DLC are donated to a nonprofit organization supporting healthcare around the world.

The Artbook file can be found on your local device after downloading this DLC. Please select "Browse Files" from your Steam-Library
